instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'canvas-confetti' for the celebration effect.
2. CANVAS LOGIC: The core is the <canvas> element. Use the 'wheel' or 'arc' drawing logic.
3. SCORING: Implement a standard deviation algorithm. 100% is mathematically impossible for humans, but map <5px deviation to 90%+ scores to make it fun.
4. RESPONSIVENESS: Ensure the canvas resizes correctly on window resize. On mobile, disable scrolling while touching the canvas (touch-action: none).
5. FONTS: Import the Google Fonts in the index.css or index.html immediately.
6. SHARING: The 'Tweet' button should open a window.open() intent with the text: 'I drew a circle with X% accuracy! Can you beat me? #PerfectCircle'.
7. SOUND: If adding sound, use the Web Audio API for simple synthesized beeps to avoid external asset dependencies if possible, or use standard UI click sounds.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
